select u.id, u.account, u.avatar, u.email, u.status, u.member_time as memberTime, u.create_time as createTime, r.name as roleName from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.id and r.is_deleted = 0 where u.is_deleted = 0
and u.account like concat('%', #{account}, '%')
limit #{pageNum}, #{pageSize}
order by u.create_time desc
